title:
Tightness of the weight-distribution bound for strongly regular polar
  graphs
authors: Rhys J. Evans, Sergey Goryainov, Leonid Shalaginov
abstract:
In this paper we show the tightness of the weight-distribution bound for the
positive non-principle eigenvalue of strongly regular (affine) polar graphs and
characterise the optimal eigenfunctions. Additionally, we show the tightness of
the weight-distribution bound for the negative non-principle eigenvalue of some
unitary polar graphs.
